name: Sila JS
body: This small JavaScript library enable writing more readable conditions and selector functions, especially useful when dealing with collections (e.g. processing JSON). Both basic condition checkers and related function generators (to use with filter) are provided. It's pure JavaScript, apply anywhere in any project! Basically you will replace this pretty cluttered code ``` if (x === 3 || x === 8 || x === 12) { var result = list.filter(function(element) { return element > 3 && element < 25; }); } ``` with this ``` if (value(x).isIn(3, 8, 12)) { var result = list.filter(matching.between(3, 25)); } ```
